arm hole section knit all the way to the shoulder then assemble the front and back shoulder by using kitchener stitch 2 begin your work cast on 190 sts on a 7mm needle with your preferred method -i used german twisted cast on- not too tightly if you would like to have a bit of ruffle effect like mine i recommend you to use german twisted cast on method *join in the round and knit 9 rounds change
